column4: samba connection no longer works after upgrading to 8.0.4 - any suggestions?
I can't connect to my samba server ... worked fine before upgrade - eclipse is not stable either.

ianliu_88: right click the 'Public' folder in your home dir...  select "Share Folder" near the bottom of the right click menu... this won't work yet, log out and back in... then do it again... now it should work  :)
